Package ohos.agp.animation

Class AnimatorGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.Animator
      • ohos.agp.animation.AnimatorGroup

  • public class AnimatorGroup
extends Animator
    Creates an animator group for playing animations in series or in parallel.
    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AnimatorGroup.Builder
      Builder class of AnimatorGroup, used to build complex animator group.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.animation.Animator

        Animator.CurveType, Animator.LoopedListener, Animator.StateChangedListener, Animator.TimelineCurve

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected AnimatorGroup.Builder mBuilder
      Indicates a Builder object, which is used to create a complex animator group.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.animation.Animator

        INFINITE, mLoopedListener, mPauseListener, mStartListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AnimatorGroup​()
      Default constructor used to create an animator group.

      • mBuilder

        Indicates a Builder object, which is used to create a complex animator group.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatorGroup

        public AnimatorGroup​()
        Default constructor used to create an animator group.

    • Method Detail

      • runParallel

        public void runParallel​(Animator... items)
        Specifies a group of animations that are played in parallel. Calling this method will clear previously added animations.
        Parameters:
        items - Specifies a group of animations that are played in parallel.
        Since:
        4

      • runSerially

        public void runSerially​(Animator... items)
        Specifies a group of animations that are played in series. Calling this method will clear previously added animations.
        Parameters:
        items - Specifies a group of animations that are played in series.
        Since:
        4

      • getRoundCount

        public int getRoundCount​()
        Obtains the total rounds of animator groups. A group of animations that are played in parallel is regarded as a round.

      • getAnimatorsAt

        public ArrayList<Animator> getAnimatorsAt​(int round)
        Obtains animators used in a round of an animator group.
        Parameters:
        round - Specifies the index (starting from 0) of animations in an animator group.
        Returns:
        Returns a group of animations that are played in parallel.

      • clear

        public void clear​()
        Clears the animations in an animator group.

      • build

        public AnimatorGroup.Builder build​()
        Obtains a builder that assists in creating an animator group, calling this method will clear previously added animations.
        Returns:
        Returns the builder of the current animator group. Each animator group has only one builder.

      • setDuration

        public void setDuration​(long duration)
        Sets the duration of an animator group. The specified time applies to all animations in the animator group. If no value is specified, the getDuration method in AnimatorGroup will return -1.
        Parameters:
        duration - Specifies the duration for animations in an animator group. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.

      • setDelay

        public void setDelay​(long startDelay)
        Sets the startup delay of an animator group. The startup delay is applicable only to the first round.
        Parameters:
        startDelay - Specifies the startup delay for animations in an animator group. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.

      • setLoopedCount

        public void setLoopedCount​(int loopedCount)
        Sets the repetition times of an animator group. Repetition of an animator group means repeatedly calling the start function of animations in the group. The final animation effect depends on parameter configurations of animations in the group.
        Parameters:
        loopedCount - Specifies the repetition times of animations in an animator group. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, or INFINITE. If the value is 0, the animation will be played only once.

      • setCurveType

        public void setCurveType​(int curveType)
        Sets an curveType used by an animator group. The specified curveType applies to all animations in the animator group. If no value is specified, the getCurveType method in AnimatorGroup will return -1. For details, see Animator.CurveType.INVALID.
        Parameters:
        curveType - Specifies the curveType type.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Animator.CurveType

      • setStateChangedListener

        public void setStateChangedListener​(Animator.StateChangedListener listener)
        Sets the state changed listener for animator groups.
        Parameters:
        listener - Specifies the pause and resume listener for animator groups. You can set it to null to clear the existing listener.
        Since:
        3

      • setLoopedListener

        public void setLoopedListener​(Animator.LoopedListener listener)
        Sets the repeat listener for animator groups.
        Parameters:
        listener - Specifies the repeat listener for animator groups. You can set it to null to clear the existing listener.

      • setCurve

        public void setCurve​(Animator.TimelineCurve curve)
        Sets a timeline curve for all animations in this AnimatorGroup object.
        Parameters:
        curve - Indicates the curve to set.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Animator.TimelineCurve
